name: Football Russian 20!8
description: What do you think, in what conditions do you play football in Russia in small towns and villages? In this game, you can enjoy the Russian atmosphere of football and punch a penalty to the intoxicated goalkeeper!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: AMD fx6300 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750ti Storage: 500 MB available space
